An individual post follows.

Tonight’s Show: Music That Makes Me Happy

I’ve been in a good mood, even after a terrible attempted DJ set last week, caused (largely) by hardware problems. I’ve been happy, but that hasn’t inspired me to sift through my collection and pick out anything in particular. So, at the suggestion of a friend, these are a bunch of songs in a fairly aesthetically sensible progression that are happy and make me happy. So enjoy, because I totally will.

  1. The Mad Capsule Markets – Good Girl ~ Dedicated to bride
  2. The Black Dog With Black Sifichi – Invisible Things
  3. Underworld – Jumbo
  4. Mogwai – R U Still Into It? (DJ Q Remix)
  5. Nelly Furtado – Like A Bird (Asha Remix)
  6. Reich Remixed Compilation – Megamix (Tranquility Bass Remix)
  7. Tortoise – Six Pack
  8. Aphex Twin – Girl/Boy Song
  9. Roni Size + Reprazent – Heroes
  10. Machine Drum – Hello My Future (Tstewart Remix)
—Mar 11, 2003
